# A convenient markdown editor with two modes. Type markdown directly or use the graphical editor editor.

## App Features

* [x] Preview your markdown as you write it
* [x] You don't need to remember the syntax just use the graphical editor (WYSIWYG)
* [x] Easily insert tables with only two clicks
* [x] Embed images
* [x] Copy tables from Excel
* [x] Check or uncheck todo items with the mouse
* [x] Integrated syntax highlighting to spot invalid markup faster
* [x] Advanced code blocks with support for multiple programming languages
* [x] Support for most common markdown file extensions
